name: [Smileface.Legend] Avoid Bullet with your head!
description:
I'm developing "Smileface.Legend" 

This game use your face as a controller.

Smile has a great power.

How To Play :

- Move your face(head) for moving your character.

- "B" key to change your camera input.

- "C" key to toggle(hide/show) the camera UI

- "Smile:)" to trigger "Slowdown" abillity.

If you want to respond your game, just smile :)
